name: Banana Growers Association, Belize
memberOrga: Banana Growers Association, Belize is not affiliated with other organizations, national or international.
goal: Banana Growers Association, Belize is purchasing and exporting the banana production from banana growers in Belize. The fruit is exported to the UK, purchased by Fyffes PLC
euInitiatives:
BAM (Banana Accompanying Measures) 2013
Productivity enhancement of the banana farms through integrated soil fertility management in the Banana Belt area of Belize.
Programme is managed by IICA.
